sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField = Class.create();
CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField.prototype = {


    initialize: function() {},

    process: function(tableName) {

        var map = {};
        var result = [];

        var tableFields = this._getTableFields(tableName);
        for (var j = 0; j < tableFields.length; j++){
          map[tableFields[j]] = '';
        }

        for (var tab in map) {
            result.push(tab);
        }

        return result;
    },


    _getTableFields: function(table) {
        var fields = [];
        var gr = new GlideAggregate('sys_dictionary');
        gr.addQuery('name', table);
        // exclude entries for duplicate_of field
        gr.addQuery('element', 'STARTSWITH', 'feature');
        gr.addAggregate('count');
        gr.orderByAggregate('count');
        gr.groupBy('element');
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next())
            fields.push('' + gr.element);

        return fields;
    },

    type: 'CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-15 21:51:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8a0a416cc3f1201099b86a764440dde0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">c60efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8a0a416cc3f1201099b86a764440dde0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-02-16 18:22:04</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1022</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
